title: [feature request] [Caffe2] Add "sigmoid" layer into the brew API
body_html:
It would be very nice to include the "sigmoid" layer into the brew API. I think it's a pretty standard activation function to be in there such as relu and tanh.

As far as I know and checked, this layer is not included yet in brew:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/python/brew.py
body_text:

body:
It would be very nice to include the "sigmoid" layer into the brew API. I think it's a pretty standard activation function to be in there such as relu and tanh.

As far as I know and checked, this layer is not included yet in brew:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/python/brew.py
